t: Brand Gift Cards - Amazon Customer Service
s: Brand Gift Cards are gift cards issued by different brands across categories such as jewellery, travel & hospitality, food, entertainment, electronics, etc. These Gift Cards can be bought from Amazon.in and can be redeemed on specific brand apps or stores depending on the brand.

t: Amazon.com Gift Cards
s: Beware of gift card scams. Do not provide any gift card details (such as the claim code) to someone you do not know or trust. Never use Amazon.com Gift Cards for payment outside of Amazon or its affiliated stores, and never use gift cards for other retailers and brands outside of their stores.

t: Buy Amazon Gift Cards & eGifts | Shop Now
s: GiftYa is like a gift card, only much better. Text a Amazon egift with GiftYa and the recipient can use it like an egift code, can link it to their Visa or Mastercard, or they can swap it for another merchant they choose.
